SELECT e.status, c.course_id, c.course_code, c.title, c.classroom, c.type, c.grade, s.year, s.semester, c.time, c.credit, c.max_std, c.rem_std, c.user_id FROM course c JOIN semester s ON s.semester_id = c.semester_id LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON e.course_id = c.course_id AND e.user_id = #{userId} WHERE s.year = #{year} AND s.semester = #{semester} AND c.status = '승인' AND (e.status IS NULL OR e.status NOT IN ('수강완료'))
AND c.type LIKE CONCAT(#{type}, '%')
AND c.grade = #{grade}
AND c.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND c.user_id IN
#{id}
AND c.type LIKE '전공%'
ORDER BY c.title

SELECT e.status, c.course_id, c.course_code, c.title, c.classroom, c.type, c.grade, s.year, s.semester, c.time, c.credit, c.max_std, c.rem_std, c.user_id
FROM course c JOIN enrollment e ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN semester s ON c.semester_id = s.semester_id WHERE e.user_id = #{userId} AND s.semester_id = #{semesterId} AND e.status = '수강중' ORDER BY c.title
